totalBlindness.name: Non-text Content
totalBlindness.description: Provide text alternatives for all non-text content.

totalBlindness.name: Information and Relationships
totalBlindness.description: Ensure that information structure can be programmatically determined.

totalBlindness.name: Keyboard
totalBlindness.description: All content must be operable via keyboard.

totalBlindness.name: Labels or Instructions
totalBlindness.description: Provide descriptive labels for data inputs.

totalBlindness.name: Name, Role, Value
totalBlindness.description: User interface components must have programmatically defined name, role, and value.
